Refactored State.equals() method

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

nodes.bodyText: This javadoc isn't adding any new information, so please remove it.
Java has a standard contract for equals/hashcode that two equal objects must have the same hashcode. So just generate a hashcode method for this class and I think we can call this PR done.

commit.message:
Added hashCode() function for State.java

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

nodes.bodyText: One last thing, can you run this class through the formatter. It looks like the generated single-line if statements don't have brackets.

commit.message:
Formatted compact if statements with brackets

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>
